extName.message: ReplyBot.ai - Whatsapp 自动化 AI 机器人

extDescription.message: ReplyBot 在 WhatsApp 网页上自动回复您的客户。由人工智能驱动的个性化响应。自动翻译消息。聊天总结器

extTitle.message: 打开 Whatsapp 选项卡和回复机器人侧面板 (Alt+R)

openPopup.message: 打开未读消息弹出窗口

switchTab.message: 切换到最后一个选项卡

summarizer_downloading_in_progress.message: 摘要器下载正在进行中

replace_src_text_with_translated.message: 将 src 文本替换为翻译后的文本

how_url_patterns_work.message: URL 模式在 ReplyBot AI 中的工作原理
how_url_patterns_work.description: How URL Patterns Work in ReplyBot AI

replybot_will_extract_the_ASIN.message: ReplyBot 将从代理的输入中提取 ASIN
replybot_will_extract_the_ASIN.description: ReplyBot will extract the ASIN from the agent's input

if_the_customer_has_provided_the_ASIN.message: ReplyBot 将检查客户是否提供了 ASIN，如果没有，则询问客户是否提供。
if_the_customer_has_provided_the_ASIN.description: ReplyBot will check if the customer has provided the ASIN, or ask the customer for it if not available.

suggest_upto_5_reply_messages.message: 建议最多 5 条回复消息

switch_tab_when_new_message_received.message: 收到新消息时切换选项卡
switch_tab_when_new_message_received.description: Switch Tab When new message received

switch_tab_time_schedule.message: 切换选项卡 时间表

open_popup_when_new_message_received.message: 收到新消息时打开弹出窗口
open_popup_when_new_message_received.description: Open popup When new message received

no_open_chat.message: 目前 WhatsApp 中没有打开任何聊天。请打开聊天窗口
no_open_chat.description: No chats are currently open in WhatsApp. Please open a chat
